alert.note: Alert for Carbon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued June 12 at 4:49PM MDT until June 13 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WATCH FOR THE ROBERTSON DRAW BURN AREA IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding, rock slides and debris flows caused by excessive rainfall are possible over the Robertson Draw Burn Area. * WHERE...A portion of south central Montana, including the following county, Carbon. * WHEN...Through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall over the Robertson Draw Burn Area is expected. Residents near the Robertson Draw Burn Area should prepare for potential flooding impacts. Be sure to stay up to date with information from local authorities. Heavy rainfall could trigger flash flooding of low-lying areas, urbanized street flooding, and debris flows in and near recent wildfire burn scars. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rainfall is expected over the Robertson Draw Burn Area, which may lead to flash flooding and debris flows. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
